thread.title: Troy Deeney off the mark as Watford overcome in-form Stoke - Ilkley Gazette
thread.title_full: Troy Deeney off the mark as Watford overcome in-form Stoke - Ilkley Gazette - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Ilkley Gazette
title: Troy Deeney off the mark as Watford overcome in-form Stoke - Ilkley Gazette
text:
Troy Deeney notched his first goal of the season as Watford ended Stoke's winning run by beating them 2-0 at the Britannia Stadium. The Hornets skipper - who netted 21 times in the club's promotion campaign last term - opened the scoring in the 43rd minute from a flick by fellow forward Odion Ighalo, moments after each player had hit the crossbar just seconds apart.
 Ilkley Gazette.
